name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.
name.caption: Name
name.name: name

string.description: The account sid to be used to connect to Twilio.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The authentication token to be used to connect to Twilio.
string.caption: Auth Token
string.name: authToken

globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.
globalRef.caption: Config Reference
globalRef.name: config-ref

cloud-connector.description: Twilio is a provider of cloud API for voice and SMS communications for customers who want to use phone services as marketing leverage.
cloud-connector.caption: Twilio

mode.modeLabel: Add incoming phone number by area code
Add incoming phone number by phone number
Get available phone numbers advanced seach
Get incoming phone numbers by incoming phone number sid
Get outgoing caller id by outgoing caller id sid
Get sub account by account sid
Get sub account by friendly name
Update outgoing caller id by outgoing caller id sid

cloud-connector.caption: Add Incoming Phone Number By Area Code

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The area code in which you'd like a new incoming phone number. Any three digit, US area code is valid. Twilio will provision a random phone number within this area code for you.
string.caption: Area Code
string.name: areaCode

string.description: A human readable description of the new incoming phone number. Maximum 64 characters. Defaults to a formatted version of the number.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials the new phone number.
string.caption: Voice Url
string.name: voiceUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Voice Method
enum.name: voiceMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url.
flowRef.caption: Voice Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: voice-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request to pass status parameters (such as call ended) to your application.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

boolean.description: Do a lookup of a caller's name from the CNAM database and post it to your app. Either true or false. Defaults to false.
boolean.caption: Voice Caller Id Lookup
boolean.name: voiceCallerIdLookup

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle phone calls to the new number. If a VoiceApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the voice urls above and use those set on the application.
string.caption: Voice Application Sid
string.name: voiceApplicationSid

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the phone number.
string.caption: Sms Url
string.name: smsUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Sms Method
enum.name: smsMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.
flowRef.caption: Sms Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-fallback-flow-ref

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle SMSs sent to the new number. If a SmsApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the SMS urls above and use those set on the application.
string.caption: Sms Application Sid
string.name: smsApplicationSid

cloud-connector.caption: Add Incoming Phone Number By Phone Number

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: A human readable description of the new incoming phone number. Maximum 64 characters. Defaults to a formatted version of the number.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The phone number you want to purchase. The number should be formated starting with a '+' followed by the country code and the number in E.164 format e.g., '+15105555555'.
string.caption: Phone Number
string.name: phoneNumber

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials the new phone number.
string.caption: Voice Url
string.name: voiceUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Voice Method
enum.name: voiceMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url.
flowRef.caption: Voice Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: voice-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request to pass status parameters (such as call ended) to your application.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

boolean.description: Do a lookup of a caller's name from the CNAM database and post it to your app. Either true or false. Defaults to false.
boolean.caption: Voice Caller Id Lookup
boolean.name: voiceCallerIdLookup

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle phone calls to the new number. If a VoiceApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the voice urls above and use those set on the application.
string.caption: Voice Application Sid
string.name: voiceApplicationSid

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the phone number.
string.caption: Sms Url
string.name: smsUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Sms Method
enum.name: smsMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.
flowRef.caption: Sms Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-fallback-flow-ref

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle SMSs sent to the new number. If a SmsApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the SMS urls above and use those set on the application.
string.caption: Sms Application Sid
string.name: smsApplicationSid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: A human readable description for the new caller ID with maximum length 64 characters. Defaults to a nicely formatted version of the number.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The phone number to verify. Should be formatted with a '+' and country code e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format). Twilio will also accept unformatted US numbers e.g., (415) 555-1212, 415-555-1212.
string.caption: Phone Number
string.name: phoneNumber

integer.description: The number of seconds, between 0 and 60, to delay before initiating the validation call. Defaults to 0.
integer.caption: Call Delay
integer.name: callDelay

string.description: Digits to dial after connecting the validation call.
string.caption: Extension
string.name: extension

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The call sid to modify.
string.caption: Call Sid
string.name: callSid

string.description: Either canceled or completed. Specifying canceled will attempt to hangup calls that are queued or ringing but not affect calls already in progress. Specifying completed will attempt to hang up a call even if it's already in progress.
string.caption: Status
string.name: status

string.description: A valid URL that returns TwiML. Twilio will immediately redirect the call to the new TwiML.
string.caption: Url
string.name: url

enum.description: The HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Method
enum.name: method

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Requests to this application's URLs will start a new TwiML session with this API version. Either 2010-04-01 or 2008-08-01. Defaults to your account's default API version.
string.caption: Api Version
string.name: apiVersion

string.description: A human readable description of the new application. Maximum 64 characters.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials a phone number assigned to this application.
string.caption: Voice Url
string.name: voiceUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Voice Method
enum.name: voiceMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url.
flowRef.caption: Voice Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: voice-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request to pass status parameters (such as call ended) to your application.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

boolean.description: Do a lookup of a caller's name from the CNAM database and post it to your app. Either true or false. Defaults to false.
boolean.caption: Voice Caller Id Lookup
boolean.name: voiceCallerIdLookup

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to a phone number assigned to this application.
string.caption: Sms Url
string.name: smsUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Sms Method
enum.name: smsMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.
flowRef.caption: Sms Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: Twilio will make a POST request to this flow to pass status parameters (such as sent or failed) to your application if you specify this application's Sid as the ApplicationSid on an outgoing SMS request.
flowRef.caption: Sms Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-status-callback-flow-ref

string.description: A human readable description of the new subaccount, up to 64 characters. Defaults to "SubAccount Created at {YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM meridiam".
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.name: recordingSid

string.description: The account sid from where to get the number, leave empty to use.
string.caption: Account Sid From
string.name: accountSidFrom

string.description: The account sid where to transfer the phone number.
string.caption: Account Sid To
string.name: accountSidTo

string.description: The incoming phone number sid to transfer.

string.name: incomingPhoneNumberSid

string.description: The account sid for which to get the details, leave empty to use to use.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only return the Account resources with friendly names that exactly match this name.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

enum.description: Only return Account resources with the given status. Can be closed, suspended or active.
enum.caption: Account Status
enum.name: accountStatus

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only return the Application resources with friendly names that exactly match this name.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

integer.description: An integer log level corresponding to the type of notification: 0 is ERROR, 1 is WARNING.
integer.caption: Log
integer.name: log

string.description: Only show notifications for this date. Should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as MessageDate=YYYY-MM-DD for messages logged at or after midnight on a date.
string.caption: Message Date
string.name: messageDate

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only show the caller id resource that exactly matches this name.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: Only show the caller id resource that exactly matches this phone number.
string.caption: Phone Number
string.name: phoneNumber

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only show SMS messages sent on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. Example: DateSent=2009-07-06. You can also specify inequality, such as DateSent=YYYY-MM-DD for SMS messages sent on or after midnight on a date.
string.caption: Date Sent
string.name: dateSent

string.description: Only show SMS messages from this phone number.
string.caption: From
string.name: from

string.description: Only show SMS messages to this phone number.
string.caption: To
string.name: to

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The application sid to use in the query.
string.caption: Application Sid
string.name: applicationSid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Find phone numbers in the specified Area Code. Only available for North American numbers.
string.caption: Area Code
string.name: areaCode

string.description: A pattern to match phone numbers on. Valid characters are '*' and [0-9a-zA-Z]. The '*' character will match any single digit.
string.caption: Contains
string.name: contains

string.description: Limit results to a particular postal code. Given a phone number, search within the same postal code as that number.
string.caption: In Postal Code
string.name: inPostalCode

string.description: Limit results to a particular region (i.e. State/Province). Given a phone number, search within the same Region as that number.
string.caption: In Region
string.name: inRegion

string.description: A country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (e.g. 'US' for United States, 'CA' for Canada).
string.caption: Iso Country Code
string.name: isoCountryCode

cloud-connector.caption: Get Available Phone Numbers Advanced Seach

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Find phone numbers in the specified Area Code. Only available for North American numbers.
string.caption: Area Code
string.name: areaCode

string.description: A pattern to match phone numbers on. Valid characters are '*' and [0-9a-zA-Z]. The '*' character will match any single digit.
string.caption: Contains
string.name: contains

string.description: Limit results to a particular postal code. Given a phone number, search within the same postal code as that number.
string.caption: In Postal Code
string.name: inPostalCode

string.description: Limit results to a particular region (i.e. State/Province). Given a phone number, search within the same Region as that number.
string.caption: In Region
string.name: inRegion

string.description: A country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (e.g. 'US' for United States, 'CA' for Canada).
string.caption: Iso Country Code
string.name: isoCountryCode

string.description: Given a latitude/longitude pair lat,long find geographically close numbers within Distance miles.
string.caption: Near Lat Long
string.name: nearLatLong

string.description: Given a phone number, find a geographically close number within Distance miles. Distance defaults to 25 miles.
string.caption: Near Phone Number
string.name: nearPhoneNumber

string.description: Limit results to a specific Local access and transport area (LATA). Given a phone number, search within the same LATA as that number.
string.caption: In Lata
string.name: inLata

string.description: Limit results to a specific rate center, or given a phone number search within the same rate center as that number. Requires InLata to be set as well.
string.caption: In Rate Center
string.name: inRateCenter

string.description: Specifies the search radius for a Near- query in miles. If not specified this defaults to 25 miles.
string.caption: Distance
string.name: distance

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: A pattern to match phone numbers on. Valid characters are '*' and [0-9a-zA-Z]. The '*' character will match any single digit.
string.caption: Contains
string.name: contains

string.description: A country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (e.g. 'US' for United States, 'CA' for Canada).
string.caption: Iso Country Code
string.name: isoCountryCode

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The call sid to use in the query.
string.caption: Call Sid
string.name: callSid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only show calls from this phone number.
string.caption: From
string.name: from

string.description: Only show calls that started on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. Also supports inequalities, such as StartTime=YYYY-MM-DD for calls that started at or after midnight on a date.
string.caption: Start Time
string.name: startTime

string.description: Only show calls currently in this status. May be queued, ringing, in-progress, completed, failed, busy, or no-answer.
string.caption: Status
string.name: status

string.description: Only show calls to this phone number.
string.caption: To
string.name: to

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The conference sid to use in the query.
string.caption: Conference Sid
string.name: conferenceSid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only show conferences that started on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as DateCreated=YYYY-MM-DD for conferences that started at or after midnight on a date.
string.caption: Date Created
string.name: dateCreated

string.description: Only show conferences that were last updated on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as DateUpdated=YYYY-MM-DD for conferences that were updated at or after midnight on a date.
string.caption: Date Updated
string.name: dateUpdated

string.description: List conferences who's FriendlyName is the exact match of this string.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: Only show conferences currently in with this status. May be init, in-progress, or completed.
string.caption: Status
string.name: status

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Only show the incoming phone number resources with friendly names that exactly match this name.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: Only show the incoming phone number resources that match this pattern. You can specify partial numbers and use '*' as a wildcard for any digit.
string.caption: Phone Number
string.name: phoneNumber

string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The transcription sid to use in the query.
string.caption: Transcription Sid
string.name: transcriptionSid

enum.description: The transcription format of the response.
enum.caption: Transcription Format
enum.name: transcriptionFormat

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The recording sid to use in the query.
string.caption: Recording Sid
string.name: recordingSid

enum.description: The transcription format for the response.
enum.caption: Transcription Format
enum.name: transcriptionFormat

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The phone number to use as the caller id. Format with a '+' and country code e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format). Must be a Twilio number or a valid outgoing caller id for your account.
string.caption: From
string.name: from

string.description: The number to call formatted with a '+' and country code e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format). Twilio will also accept unformatted US numbers e.g., (415) 555-1212, 415-555-1212.
string.caption: To
string.name: to

string.description: The fully qualified URL that should be consulted when the call connects. Just like when you set a URL on a phone number for handling inbound calls.
string.caption: Url
string.name: url

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle this phone call. If this parameter is present, Twilio will ignore all of the voice URLs passed and use the URLs set on the application.
string.caption: Application Sid
string.name: applicationSid

enum.description: The HTTP method Twilio should use when making its request to the above Url parameter's value. Defaults to POST. If an ApplicationSid parameter is present, this parameter is ignored.
enum.caption: Method
enum.name: method

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url. If an ApplicationSid parameter is present, this parameter is ignored.
flowRef.caption: Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request when the call ends to notify your app. If an ApplicationSid parameter is present, this parameter is ignored.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

string.description: A string of keys to dial after connecting to the number. Valid digits in the string include: any digit (0-9), '#' and '*'. For example, if you connected to a company phone number, and wanted to dial extension 1234 and then the pound key, use SendDigits=1234#. Remember to URL-encode this string, since the '#' character has special meaning in a URL.
string.caption: Send Digits
string.name: sendDigits

string.description: Tell Twilio to try and determine if a machine (like voicemail) or a human has answered the call. Possible values are Continue and Hangup.
string.caption: If Machine
string.name: ifMachine

string.description: The integer number of seconds that Twilio should allow the phone to ring before assuming there is no answer. Default is 60 seconds, the maximum is 999 seconds. Note, you could set this to a low value, such as 15, to hangup before reaching an answering machine or voicemail.
string.caption: Timeout
string.name: timeout

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The text of the message you want to send, limited to 160 characters.
string.caption: Body
string.name: body

string.description: A Twilio number enabled for SMS. Only phone numbers purchased from Twilio work here; you cannot (for example) spoof SMS messages from your own cell phone number.
string.caption: From
string.name: from

string.description: The destination phone number. Format with a '+' and country code e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format). Twilio will also accept unformatted US numbers e.g., (415) 555-1212, 415-555-1212.
string.caption: To
string.name: to

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will POST to when your message is processed. Twilio will POST the SmsSid as well as SmsStatus=sent or SmsStatus=failed.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

string.description: Twilio will POST SmsSid as well as SmsStatus=sent or SmsStatus=failed to the URL in the SmsStatusCallback property of this Application. If the StatusCallback parameter above is also passed, the Application's SmsStatusCallback parameter will take precedence.
string.caption: Application Sid
string.name: applicationSid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Update the human-readable description of this account.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

enum.description: Alter the status of this account: use closed to irreversibly close this account, suspended to temporarily suspend it, or active to reactivate it.
enum.caption: Account Status
enum.name: accountStatus

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Requests to this application's URLs will start a new TwiML session with this API version. Either 2010-04-01 or 2008-08-01.
string.caption: Api Version
string.name: apiVersion

string.description: The application sid to update.
string.caption: Application Sid
string.name: applicationSid

string.description: A human readable description of the application, with maximum length 64 characters.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials a phone number assigned to this application.
string.caption: Voice Url
string.name: voiceUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceUrl. Either GET or POST.
enum.caption: Voice Method
enum.name: voiceMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by VoiceUrl.
flowRef.caption: Voice Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: voice-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request to pass status parameters (such as call ended) to your application.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

boolean.description: Do a lookup of a caller's name from the CNAM database and post it to your app. Either true or false.
boolean.caption: Voice Caller Id Lookup
boolean.name: voiceCallerIdLookup

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to a phone number assigned to this application.
string.caption: Sms Url
string.name: smsUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Either GET or POST.
enum.caption: Sms Method
enum.name: smsMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.
flowRef.caption: Sms Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: Twilio will make a POST request to this flow to pass status parameters (such as sent or failed) to your application if you specify this application's Sid as the ApplicationSid on an outgoing SMS request.
flowRef.caption: Sms Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-status-callback-flow-ref

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: Calls to this phone number will start a new TwiML session with this API version. Either 2010-04-01 or 2008-08-01.
string.caption: Api Version
string.name: apiVersion

string.description: A human readable description of the new incoming phone number resource, with maximum length 64 characters.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The incoming phone number sid to use.
string.caption: Incoming Phone Number Sid
string.name: incomingPhoneNumberSid

string.description: The unique 34 character id of the account to which you wish to transfer this phone number.
string.caption: Account Sid Destination
string.name: accountSidDestination

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials the new phone number.
string.caption: Voice Url
string.name: voiceUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Voice Method
enum.name: voiceMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url.
flowRef.caption: Voice Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: voice-fallback-flow-ref

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request to pass statusCallback parameters (such as call ended) to your application.
flowRef.caption: Status Callback Flow
flowRef.name: status-callback-flow-ref

boolean.description: Do a lookup of a caller's name from the CNAM database and post it to your app. Either true or false.
boolean.caption: Voice Caller Id Lookup
boolean.name: voiceCallerIdLookup

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle phone calls to this number. If a VoiceApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the voice urls above and use those set on the application instead.
string.caption: Voice Application Sid
string.name: voiceApplicationSid

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the phone number.
string.caption: Sms Url
string.name: smsUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
enum.caption: Sms Method
enum.name: smsMethod

flowRef.description: A flow that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by sms.
flowRef.caption: Sms Fallback Flow
flowRef.name: sms-fallback-flow-ref

string.description: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle SMSs sent to this number. If a SmsApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the SMS urls above and use those set on the application instead.
string.caption: Sms Application Sid
string.name: smsApplicationSid

cloud-connector.caption: Update Outgoing Caller Id By Outgoing Caller Id Sid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: A human readable description of a Caller ID, with maximum length of 64 characters. Defaults to a nicely formatted version of the phone number.
string.caption: Friendly Name
string.name: friendlyName

string.description: The outgoing caller id sid to update.
string.caption: Outgoing Caller Id Sid
string.name: outgoingCallerIdSid

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The call sid to use.
string.caption: Call Sid
string.name: callSid

string.description: The conference sid to use.
string.caption: Conference Sid
string.name: conferenceSid

boolean.description: Specifying true will mute the participant, while false will un-mute.
boolean.caption: Muted
boolean.name: muted

string.description: Optionally override globally configured Account SID.
string.caption: Account Sid
string.name: accountSid

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the sandbox.
string.caption: Sms Url
string.name: smsUrl

string.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody calls this sandbox.
string.caption: Voice Url
string.name: voiceUrl

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

enum.name: smsMethod

enum.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the above URL. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.
